name: Magic Counting 4 Toddlers Writing Numbers for Kids
name_original: Magic Counting 4 Toddlers Writing Numbers for Kids
description:
A lot of apps for kids have been created by MAGE, a software company which develops educational apps, kids learning apps for age 4 free, interactive books and nursery rhymes for young children and toddlers.

Our games for toddlers 3 years ol are distinguished by high quality content with particular attention to design. The purpose of all our baby games for children 3 4 yrs free is aimed for your child's all-round development.

Children will write numbers learning for kids free, count to 10, phonics, numbers, counting numbers for nursery kids learn to sort. The write numbers app help preschoolers to develop memory, attention span, vocabulary and speech, as well as other basic skills. Children are exposed to writing and counting through building puzzles and doing simple math.

As a company we strive to make our apps for kids and kid number games for kindergarten practical, instilling a desire for knowledge. Our learning games for kids 1st grade free contain no third party advertising.

There is only a part of the content available in the free version of the application. To gain access to the full version, you will need to make a purchase.
